reviewText: A quart of whiskey a day. oh my God. DO NOT ATTEMPT THAT AT HOME. that will kill you in a week.W.C. Fields(a.k.a Humpty Dumpty) was a one of the all time great entertainers in history but not necessarily a good role model for all of you Baby LeRoy's out there. so please drink moderately and don't try to compete with Mr.Fields. you all make such great film historians and we still need you around.someone please say a prayer for Mr. Godfrey Daniels because he sounds much too impressionable and wants to be just like his role model Mr.Fields. Mr.Daniels sounds like a nice person and someone should be concerned.A QUART OF WHISKEY A DAY?!!! Are you all sure? I think maybe Mr. Fields is having the last laugh and taking us for suckers because i can't imagine that is even possible. but if so, MB20's Rob Thomas once said,"staight up what did you hope to learn about here?" Yikes.James
summary: Do Not Try This At Home
Title: N/A

reviewText: W C Fields - Straight-up>>>W.C. FIELDS STRAIGHT UP is the definitive feature-length celebration of the movies' best-loved curmudgeon. This Emmy Award-winning documentary traces Field's life from his childhood in Philadelphia, through his years of Hollywood stardom, to his final days. Interviews with Fields' closest friends, family and collaborators are interwoven with beautifully remastered clips from his best-loved films and his rarely seen screen appearances. The resulting film presents Fields as both a brilliant comedian and a troubled, stubborn, loner.<<<Producer's noteMuch more of an allrounder than one tends to remember - from juggling to radio - and always instantly recognised; also more of a money maker than would be commonly expected. Keen observer, sees and hears all, mumbles select accurate observation and/or feeling at any moment, like his "a plumber's idea of Cleopatra" after a screen exchange with Mae West. Specialist on pregnant pauses, occasionally violent as ultima ratio, but never really mean, more in slapstick tradition. Monsters are his screen wives and women, occasionally a sweetheart, W C Fields ever patient, taking flak and letting them run to end and collapse. Selection and presentation are excellent, Dudley Moore as comment reader a welcome extra bonus.205 - W C Fields - Straight-up  -Cleopatra's plumber - 16/11/2012
Title: N/A

reviewText: GODFREY DANIELS!!!!!!!!As a life-long WC Fields fan, this docu is GREAT!!!So great, it almost brought tears to my eyes!Now I must go imbibe some 'relaxer' with Mr Muckle............
Title: N/A

reviewText: W.C. Fields is a comic whose genius deserves to be rediscovered, and this excellent documentary is a great place to start. It covers Fields' entire life and features interviews with not only people who worked closely with him and film experts but his grandson, Ronald. A truly great documentary about an authentic comic master. Very highly recommended.
summary: Great Doc about a classic comedian
Title: N/A

reviewText: Just an entertaining bio on one of the most fascinating comedians of all time.The coverage and the quality of the film clips alone make it worthwhile. No Field's film collection is complete without it.
summary: a must for the field's fan
